attributes.action: Implement speed reducing and traffic calming controls in lidsing, Kent me7
attributes.background: Lidsing is a small hamlet on the border of Maidstone and Medway councils. Lidsing over the past years has seen huge increases  in traffic. With single lane country roads and a 60 mph speed limit. The increased traffic and the speed limit is inappropriate for the area.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Traffic control measures are the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
